comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Default is `always_for_clarity` for arithmetic, relational, and other binary operators.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: This PR did not fix all IDE0048 violations, see #13936. Since the severity was set to warning, the build should not have completed!

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Is it a bug in the Roslyn analyzer?

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> Is it a bug in the Roslyn analyzer?

No `EnforceCodeStyleInBuild` was not enabled.
